page.title: 09HOME LIFE MY HOME
page.content: My house is detached and made with red brick and has a slated roof.It is situated in the upper part of Gilwern in Winsford Grove,and is 9 years old like the rest in our road.It has 12 rooms which are:a kitchen,lounge,dining room,4 bedrooms, one bath room with a toilet and shower,a downstairs toilet and basin,large utility room and garage. The kitchen contains an electric hob,twin oven and a breakfast area.The lounge was seperated in half to be a dining room but now we have had an extension.The study used to be the garage until another one was built and the previous one was turned into a study.2 of the bedrooms are large and the others are fairly small.In the utility room we keep the washing machine and our outdoor toys.My house has electricity and gas.
